get.summary: Downloads the Validation Results, based on the supplied validation identifier in a Comma Separated Values (CSV) format.

parameters.name: validationId
parameters.description: Represents the validation identifier that will be used to download the csv results.

post.summary: Gets all validation scripts for a system, based on system type, filetype, system id and customer id.
